about_the_game:
“Forest of Soul” is a unique role-playing game.
Have you ever wondered what kind of wonderful scenery you would find if you could enter your own world of the heart?
The game process is driven by the plot, with an easy and enjoyable gaming experience, beautiful and magical dream scenes. Let’s start this unforgettable journey!

>>>Click to join the wish list and follow us to receive the message of the trial demo as soon as possible!







In a wonderful dream, a girl who lost her memory met a mysterious little ghost.
It said it was an explorer from another world and could take her to see the wonders in the dream. The girl followed the little ghost and began a thrilling and fun journey. She encountered various fantastic scenes in the dream and also made many interesting friends. However, when she was about to reach the end of the dream, she discovered an amazing secret. It turned out that all of this was related to her past…







Game Features

  • Follow the adventure of the amnesiac girl and the little ghost, experience a touching story, feel the warmth and coldness in the dream, and understand the characters’ emotional journey and growth.
  • Appreciate the beautiful scenery in the dream. Each scene has its unique style and atmosphere, making you feel like you are in a real and dreamy world.
  • Enjoy diverse gameplay, from platform jumping to puzzle solving, from sneaking to chasing, each gameplay has its challenges and fun.
  • Explore different endings in the dream. Based on your choices and actions, you may discover the secrets hidden in the dream or change the girl’s destiny. Each ending has its meaning and value, allowing you to have a deeper understanding and perception of the dream.






Gameplay

  • Use the girl’s flexible skills to experience classic platform jumping gameplay through various obstacles and mechanisms.
  • Avoid the dangers and enemies in the dream, experience the tense secret infiltration gameplay, and feel the excitement and challenge in the dream.
  • Use your observation and logic skills to solve puzzles and passwords in the dream, and experience the fun of puzzle solving.
  • Gather your courage and wisdom to deal with the chase and battle in the dream, and feel the excitement of the chase and battle gameplay.



Let’s start this unforgettable journey as soon as possible!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 10 64-bit or newer version
  • Processor: 3 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1650 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 10 64-bit or newer version
  • Processor: 4 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: ”Forest of Soul“ is a role-playing game that allows you to enter your own spiritual world and discover wonderful scenes. Follow a young girl looking for herself and direction, solve various meaningful mysteries, and experience a touching story. Let’s start this relaxing and comfortable journey!
